ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: ... with ... wouldn t ... I m not taking this as a flame ). I v found that roaming outdoors (my prefered method of hunting outdoors) is very frustration when
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "John A. Williams" <John_Williams@...>
>
> Why does someone "need" this to level? Are you using them to kite or what?
> If you "need" these boots, why didn't you try getting a group together
with
> a shaman in it?
> I'm not trying to flame or anything just curious as to why someone
wouldn't
> be able
> To advance without an item.
> John
>

I'm not taking this as a flame ). I'v found that roaming outdoors (my
prefered method of hunting outdoors) is very frustration when done with even
one other person. Server lag and client prediction makes you hunt your group
more than prey so I prefer to do it solo. I also have a druid and have
helped many people cross antonica and always had trouble having people
always either disappearing or running in circles. With my group we always
met at the end of the trip cause everyone knew how to get there, much less
frustrating.

I'm a necro, and as we go up in lvls especially after 29 when we get our
last store bought pet, we do too much damage to the mob to have the pet
taunt it (I'll be lucky to mae a 34 pet at 39 so even if the pet could taunt
it would not last long) so my only choice left is to kite.

Why should I group if I don't have to, grouping outdoors is silly I'm seeing
groups around the aviak village and I find it funny. The spawns are too
sporadic for a group, and roaming the outdoors with a group is nearly
impossible.

I've played a druid to 37 grouping all the way from 19-37, kited very rarely
only when my group of friends were not on so I've so I wanted to try
something different, but to catch up to my friends I am trying to level fast
and soloing will let me do that.

Druid to 37 - 26 days played time grouping after 19
Necro to 27 - 8 days played time solo. This includes about 18 hours in total
camping jboots and about 8 hours hunting green skels for 3 backpacks of bone
chips

I have no interest in revisiting dungeons that I spent tons of time in
already.
.
